plot: How to save the rapidly dying sea? 40 years of targeting the general public with awareness campaigns and fundraising has not succeeded. In 2010, the Baltic Sea is still the most polluted sea in the world.
title: BSAS 2010: New Standard for Environmental Action
plot_es: How to save the rapidly dying sea? 40 years of targeting the general public with awareness campaigns and fundraising has not succeeded. In 2010, the Baltic Sea is still the most polluted sea in the world.
